title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.47 - Boarder baby
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.47 - Boarder baby

State Regulations
(a) A baby
receiving lodging in the institution and who is not an institution
patient. (b) A newborn infant whose
mother is discharged but the newborn does not occupy a patient bed but is
retained in the nursery. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
